title: R Notes
text:
About



This is my notes on R programming.


Last updated: 2022-04-08

title: 1Â  Vector
text:
logical
numeric: integer, double
character




lgl_var <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
int_var <- c(1L, 6L, 10L)
dbl_var <- c(1, 2.5, 4.5)
chr_var <- c("these are", "some strings")


typeof(lgl_var)
#> [1] "logical"
typeof(int_var)
#> [1] "integer"
typeof(dbl_var)
#> [1] "double"
typeof(chr_var)
#> [1] "character"





c(c(1, 2), c(3, 4))
#> [1] 1 2 3 4




NA will propagate except

NA ^ 0
#> [1] 1

NA | TRUE
#> [1] TRUE

NA & FALSE
#> [1] FALSE
